SELECT bus_line.*, bus_base_info.*, user_bus_mom.account AS bus_mom_account, user_bus_driver.account AS bus_driver_account, user_bus_mom.`name` AS bus_mom_name, user_bus_mom.phone AS bus_mom_phone, user_bus_driver.`name` AS bus_driver_name, user_bus_driver.phone AS bus_driver_phone FROM bus_line LEFT JOIN bus_base_info ON bus_line.bus_base_info = bus_base_info.id LEFT JOIN `user` AS u ON bus_base_info.bus_mom = u.id LEFT JOIN `user` AS user_bus_mom ON user_bus_mom.id = bus_base_info.bus_mom LEFT JOIN `user` AS user_bus_driver ON user_bus_driver.id = bus_base_info.bus_driver WHERE bus_line.valid = 1 and user_bus_mom.account = #{busMomAccount}
AND bus_line.`mode` = #{busMode}

SELECT bus_line.*, bus_base_info.*, user_bus_mom.account AS bus_mom_account, user_bus_driver.account AS bus_driver_account, user_bus_mom.`name` AS bus_mom_name, user_bus_mom.phone AS bus_mom_phone, user_bus_driver.`name` AS bus_driver_name, user_bus_driver.phone AS bus_driver_phone FROM bus_line LEFT JOIN bus_base_info ON bus_line.bus_base_info = bus_base_info.id LEFT JOIN `user` AS u ON bus_base_info.bus_mom = u.id LEFT JOIN `user` AS user_bus_mom ON user_bus_mom.id = bus_base_info.bus_mom LEFT JOIN `user` AS user_bus_driver ON user_bus_driver.id = bus_base_info.bus_driver WHERE bus_line.valid = 1 and user_bus_driver.account = #{busDriverAccount}
AND bus_line.`mode` = #{busMode}

SELECT bus_line.*, bus_base_info.*, user_bus_mom.account AS bus_mom_account, user_bus_driver.account AS bus_driver_account FROM bus_line LEFT JOIN bus_base_info ON bus_line.bus_base_info = bus_base_info.id LEFT JOIN `user` AS u ON bus_base_info.bus_mom = u.id LEFT JOIN `user` AS user_bus_mom ON user_bus_mom.id = bus_base_info.bus_mom LEFT JOIN `user` AS user_bus_driver ON user_bus_driver.id = bus_base_info.bus_driver WHERE bus_line.valid = 1 AND bus_base_info.school_partition = #{schoolPartition}

SELECT banji.class_name as banji_name, bbi.number as bus_number, bs_m.station_name as board_station_morning_name, bs_a.station_name as board_station_afternoon_name, student.*, bl.*, bbi.* FROM student LEFT JOIN banji on banji.id = student.banji LEFT JOIN bus_stations as bs_m on bs_m.id = student.board_station_morning LEFT JOIN bus_stations as bs_a on bs_a.id = student.board_station_afternoon LEFT JOIN bus_line as bl on ( bl.id = student.bus_line_afternoon or bl.id = student.bus_line_morning) LEFT JOIN bus_base_info as bbi on bbi.id = bl.bus_base_info WHERE student.valid = '1' AND bbi.number = #{busNumber}
AND bl.`mode` = #{busMode}
SELECT * FROM bus_line AS bl LEFT JOIN bus_base_info AS bbi ON bbi.id = bl.bus_base_info WHERE bl.valid = 1 AND bbi.number = #{busNumber} AND bl.`mode` = #{busMode}
